public static interface SmartCommands.GuardedHandler

Defines a single contract which enables to turn an exception into another one.

 java.lang.Throwable onThrowable(java.lang.Throwable throwable)

Method Detail

onThrowable

java.lang.Throwable onThrowable(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
Is responsible for turning an exception into another exception.

Parameters:
throwable - the exception that is assessed
Returns:
null if and only if the method has handled the exception itself, and that it should not be propagated by the caller
